doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 34 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 8/21/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 34 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 8/21/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Proposal for a Chicago gay rights bill is voted down2. LA Times poll finds opinion of total population on homosexuals does not align with Jerry Falwell's conservative fundamentalist Christian followers3. Olympia, Washington, anti-gay group fails to get enough signatures to remove the city's gay rights ordinanceCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine4. Justice Warren Burger's attendance at a New York City event protested by the Gay and Lesbian Rights Coalition, with clipsCOMMERCIAL: Urban General Warehouse Sale5. SUNY Stony Brook Gay and Lesbian Alliance members harassed by the football team and other students6. Andy Humm on Civics and New York elections7. Funding for a Maryland AIDS education organization delayed by Maryland state legislative panel8. California governor George Deukmejian vetoes a bill protecting people with AIDS from discrimination9. Washington DC's House and Senate approve amendments to improve funding for AIDS care and research10. Gay World Series Softball Competition announcedCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp11. Outreach: Conversations with GMHC: Interview with Ruth Rodriguez and Dooley Worth on women with AIDS12. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. This week in gay history with Jeff BixbyCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazine2. Coverage of the 1986 Gay Games in San Francisco, with clips of the opening ceremonyCOMMERCIAL: Body Mate exercise equipment3. Brandon Judell with gossip tidbits and clips from the Phil Donahue Show on violence against gaysCOMMERCIAL: Water Front Airways4. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 34 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 8/21/1986]: August 1986
